Sentencas: In the present paper, the catalytic role of Ag in the oxygen adsorption of LaMnO3(0 0 1) surface has been theoretically investigated using first-principles calculations based on the density functional theory (DFT) and pseudopotential method.
Titulo: First-principles study on the catalytic role of Ag in the oxygen adsorption of LaMnO3(0 0 1) surface

Sentencas: The O-2 adsorption energy is larger for the vertical adsorption and the covalent bond was formed between O-2 molecule and surface Mn.
Titulo: First-principles study on the catalytic role of Ag in the oxygen adsorption of LaMnO3(0 0 1) surface

Sentencas: The calculation of electronic properties of interaction between Ag atom and LaMnO3(0 0 1) surface demonstrates that the most stable position for Ag adsorption is hollow site.
Titulo: First-principles study on the catalytic role of Ag in the oxygen adsorption of LaMnO3(0 0 1) surface

Sentencas: The O-2 adsorption energy dramatically increased from 0.298 eV to 1.108 eV due to Ag pre-adsorbed.
Titulo: First-principles study on the catalytic role of Ag in the oxygen adsorption of LaMnO3(0 0 1) surface

Sentencas: It is Ag pre-adsorbed that facilitates O-2 adsorption on surface.
Titulo: First-principles study on the catalytic role of Ag in the oxygen adsorption of LaMnO3(0 0 1) surface

Sentencas: The bond length and bond population of O-2 molecule indicate that Ag atom facilitates O-2 molecule dissociative adsorption.
Titulo: First-principles study on the catalytic role of Ag in the oxygen adsorption of LaMnO3(0 0 1) surface

Sentencas: The Ag atom strengthens LaMnO3(0 0 1) substrate activity and activity center was formed on surface, which enhances the electrocatalytic activity of LaMnO3 as solid oxide fuel cells cathode material at low temperature.
Titulo: First-principles study on the catalytic role of Ag in the oxygen adsorption of LaMnO3(0 0 1) surface
